title: UTF Byte order mark (BOM) crashes in the :terminal

labels.name: bug-crash
labels.description: issue reporting a crash or segfault

body:
### Problem It seems when the BOM (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Byte_order_mark) is read in the embedded terminal, an assertion fails and neovim crashes. https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d5ebf0e8-51a0-48c1-a9c6-1b971ca92ce7 The assertion that fails seems to be here https://github.com/neovim/neovim/blame/3d9fb975b957c12d412ddc508998cf59aac2a4d7/src/nvim/grid.c#L167C40-L167C40 This occurs on nightly, but does not occur on v0.10.3 Stacktrace:
